title: Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976)
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976) Page Content ​​You can no longer apply for an Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976). It closed to new applications on 22 March 2013. You might be able to a​pply for the Electronic Travel Authority (subclass 601) Electronic travel authority holders Details This information is for people who have already been granted an Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976). It explains your rights and obligations. You can use the free Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO) to check your visa status and entitlements. How long your Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976) lasts Details From the day your Your Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976) is granted it lasts the earliest of either: the life if your current passport 12 Months What this electronic travel authority lets you do Details You can: enter Australia as many times as you want while it is valid stay in Australia for up to three months on each visit. Your obligations Details You must comply with all electronic travel authority conditions and Australian laws. You must: be free from tuberculosis when you travel to and enter Australia not work while in Australia. You may be able to do some volunteer work, but only if an Australian resident would not otherwise be paid to do the work (you can be reimbursed for out-of-pocket expenses such as meals and accommodation) not study or train for more than three months not have one or more criminal convictions for which you were sentenced to more than a total of 12 months (whether you went to prison or not). Tell us if things change Details Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include: changes to your phone number, email, address or passport changes to your relationship status the birth of a child. See how to let us know if there is a change in your situation If you do not provide us with the details of any new passport issued to you, you could experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board your plane.​​
main_content:
===== main placeholder ==========================================

# Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976)

Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976)
Page Content

​​You can no longer apply for an Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976). It closed to new applications on 22 March 2013. You might be able to a​pply for theElectronic Travel Authority (subclass 601).

​​You can no longer apply for an Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976). It closed to new applications on 22 March 2013. You might be able to a​pply for the
Electronic Travel Authority (subclass 601)
.

## Electronic travel authority holders

Electronic travel authority holders
Details

This information is for people who have already been granted an Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976). It explains your rights and obligations.

This information is for people who have already been granted an Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976). It explains your rights and obligations.

You can use the freeVisa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO)to check your visa status and entitlements.

You can use the free
Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO)
to check your visa status and entitlements.

### How long your Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976) lasts

How long your Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976) lasts
Details

From the day your Your Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976) is granted it lasts the earliest of either:

From the day your Your Electronic Travel Authority (Visitor) (subclass 976) is granted it lasts the earliest of either:
- the life if your current passport
the life if your current passport
- 12 Months
12 Months

### What this electronic travel authority lets you do

What this electronic travel authority lets you do
Details

You can:

You can:
- enter Australia as many times as you want while it is valid
enter Australia as many times as you want while it is valid
- stay in Australia for up to three months on each visit.
stay in Australia for up to three months on each visit.

### Your obligations

Your obligations
Details

You must comply with all electronic travel authority conditions and Australian laws.

You must comply with all electronic travel authority conditions and Australian laws.

You must:

You must:
- be free from tuberculosis when you travel to and enter Australia
be free from tuberculosis when you travel to and enter Australia
- not work while in Australia. You may be able to do some volunteer work, but only if an Australian resident would not otherwise be paid to do the work (you can be reimbursed for out-of-pocket expenses such as meals and accommodation)
not work while in Australia. You may be able to do some volunteer work, but only if an Australian resident would not otherwise be paid to do the work (you can be reimbursed for out-of-pocket expenses such as meals and accommodation)
- not study or train for more than three months
not study or train for more than three months
- not have one or more criminal convictions for which you were sentenced to more than a total of 12 months (whether you went to prison or not).
not have one or more criminal convictions for which you were sentenced to more than a total of 12 months (whether you went to prison or not).

### Tell us if things change

Tell us if things change
Details

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:
- changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
- changes to your relationship status
changes to your relationship status
- the birth of a child.
the birth of a child.

See how to let us know if there is achange in your situation.

See how to let us know if there is a
change in your situation
.

If you do not provide us with the details of any new passport issued to you, you could experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board your plane.​​

If you do not provide us with the details of any new passport issued to you, you could experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board your plane.​​
